content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/tankerkoenig-api-client is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand the codebase and then migrate it from Java 8 to Java 17. I'll need to:

1. First, examine the directory structure
2. Check the pom.xml file to understand dependencies and current Java version
3. Update the Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run mvn clean verify to check for issues
6. Fix any issues that arise

Let me start by viewing the repository structure.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>de.codengine</groupId>
    <artifactId>tankerkoenig-api-client</artifactId>
    <version>1.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <name>Tankerkoenig API</name>
    <description>Client for the Tankerkoenig API</description>
    <url>https://github.com/codengine/tankerkoenig-api-client</url>
    <inceptionYear>2017</inceptionYear>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>MIT License</name>
            <url>http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <issueManagement>
        <url>https://github.com/codengine/tankerkoenig-api-client/issues</url>
        <system>GitHub Issues</system>
    </issueManagement>

    <distributionManagement>
        <snapshotRepository>
            <id>ossrh</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
        </snapshotRepository>
        <repository>
            <id>ossrh</id>
            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/service/local/staging/deploy/maven2/</url>
        </repository>
    </distributionManagement>

    <scm>
        <url>https://github.com/codengine/tankerkoenig-api-client</url>
        <connection>scm:git:git://github.com/codengine/tankerkoenig-api-client.git</connection>
        <developerConnection>scm:git:git@github.com:codengine/tankerkoenig-api-client.git</developerConnection>
    </scm>

    <developers>
        <developer>
            <name>Stefan Hueg</name>
            <url>https://github.com/codengine</url>
            <timezone>+1</timezone>
            <id>codengine</id>
            <roles>
                <role>developer</role>
            </roles>
        </developer>
    </developers>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
        <gson.version>2.8.0</gson.version>
        <okhttp.version>3.8.0</okhttp.version>
        <junit.version>4.12</junit.version>
        <assertj.version>3.8.0</assertj.version>
        <mockito.version>2.8.9</mockito.version>
        <equalsverifier.version>2.3</equalsverifier.version>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>${gson.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.okhttp3</groupId>
            <artifactId>okhttp</artifactId>
            <version>${okhttp.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>${junit.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.assertj</groupId>
            <artifactId>assertj-core</artifactId>
            <version>${assertj.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
            <version>${mockito.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.okhttp3</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockwebserver</artifactId>
            <version>${okhttp.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>nl.jqno.equalsverifier</groupId>
            <artifactId>equalsverifier</artifactId>
            <version>${equalsverifier.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.6.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.eluder.coveralls</groupId>
                <artifactId>coveralls-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>4.3.0</version>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.7.9</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>prepare-agent</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.6.8</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>default-deploy</id>
                        <phase>deploy</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>deploy</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <serverId>ossrh</serverId>
                    <nexusUrl>https://oss.sonatype.org/</nexusUrl>
                    <autoReleaseAfterClose>true</autoReleaseAfterClose>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>release</id>
            <build>
                <plugins>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>2.10.4</version>
                        <configuration>
                            <links>
                                <link>http://download.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/</link>
                            </links>
                        </configuration>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>jar</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>3.0.1</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>attach-sources</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>jar-no-fork</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-gpg-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>1.6</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>sign-artifacts</id>
                                <phase>verify</phase>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>sign</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                </plugins>
            </build>
        </profile>
    </profiles>
</project>

            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
            <version>${mockito.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.okhttp3</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockwebserver</artifactId>
            <version>${okhttp.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>nl.jqno.equalsverifier</groupId>
            <artifactId>equalsverifier</artifactId>
            <version>${equalsverifier.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.13.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>17</source>
                    <target>17</target>
                    <release>17</release>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.eluder.coveralls</groupId>
                <artifactId>coveralls-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>4.3.0</version>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.8.11</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>prepare-agent</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.6.13</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>default-deploy</id>
                        <phase>deploy</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>deploy</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
                <extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <serverId>ossrh</serverId>
                    <nexusUrl>https://oss.sonatype.org/</nexusUrl>
                    <autoReleaseAfterClose>true</autoReleaseAfterClose>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>release</id>
            <build>
                <plugins>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>3.6.3</version>
                        <configuration>
                            <links>
                                <link>https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/</link>
                            </links>
                        </configuration>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>jar</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>3.3.0</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>attach-sources</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>jar-no-fork</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                        <artifactId>maven-gpg-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>3.2.0</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>sign-artifacts</id>
                                <phase>verify</phase>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>sign</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                </plugins>
            </build>
        </profile>
    </profiles>
</project>

There's an issue with Mockito 5 - it's stricter about checked exceptions. Let me examine the failing test:
Let me see more of this test to understand the context:
The issue is that Mockito 5 is stricter about checked exceptions. The method being mocked (`get`) likely doesn't declare `Throwable` in its throws clause. Let me check what exceptions it throws:
47:   String get(final String url, final Map<String, Object> queryParameters) throws ClientExecutorException;

The method only throws `ClientExecutorException`, but Mockito 5 doesn't allow you to mock throwing a checked exception (`Throwable`) that is not declared in the method signature. Since `Throwable` is a checked exception but not declared, we need to throw something that's actually declared or an unchecked exception. Let me fix this test:
Now let me check what the test is trying to do and what the actual method implementation looks like:
(no output)

I see! The `execute` method has a `catch (Exception e)` but not `catch (Throwable t)`. So if a `Throwable` (not an `Exception`) is thrown, it will propagate without being caught. The test wants to verify that Throwables are NOT caught. The issue is that in Mockito 5, we can't mock throwing a checked `Throwable` when the method only declares `ClientExecutorException`.

The solution is to use an unchecked exception that extends `Throwable` but not `Exception`. We can use `Error` instead, which is also a `Throwable` but not an `Exception`:
Now let's run the build again:

The Java 8 to Java 17 migration for the tankerkoenig-api-client project has been completed successfully! The `mvn clean verify` command now passes with all 140 tests passing.

## Changes Made:

### 1. **pom.xml - Java Version Update**
   - Updated Maven compiler properties from Java 8 to Java 17
   - Added `maven.compiler.source` and `maven.compiler.target` set to 17
   - Updated compiler plugin configuration with `release` set to 17

### 2. **pom.xml - Dependency Updates**
   - **gson**: 2.8.0 → 2.10.1
   - **okhttp**: 3.8.0 → 4.12.0
   - **junit**: 4.12 → 4.13.2
   - **assertj-core**: 3.8.0 → 3.25.3
   - **mockito-core**: 2.8.9 → 5.11.0
   - **equalsverifier**: 2.3 → 3.16.1

### 3. **pom.xml - Plugin Updates**
   - **maven-compiler-plugin**: 3.6.1 → 3.13.0
   - **jacoco-maven-plugin**: 0.7.9 → 0.8.11
   - **nexus-staging-maven-plugin**: 1.6.8 → 1.6.13
   - **maven-javadoc-plugin**: 2.10.4 → 3.6.3 (with updated Java 17 docs link)
   - **maven-source-plugin**: 3.0.1 → 3.3.0
   - **maven-gpg-plugin**: 1.6 → 3.2.0

### 4. **Test Code Fix**
   - Fixed `RequesterTest.doesNotCatchThrowables()` to use `OutOfMemoryError` instead of `Throwable.class`
   - This was necessary because Mockito 5 enforces stricter rules about checked exceptions in method signatures

The project now compiles and runs with Java 17, and all 140 tests pass successfully.
